Sentencas: A physical-based model has been developed and validated to unravel the complex relationships between the global solid oxide cells response and the reaction mechanisms taking place in the electrodes.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: This numerical tool combines three length-scales modules from the electrode microstructure up to the single repeat unit.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: This model allows computing the local distribution of reaction kinetic rates, current densities, and gas composition as function of the cell operating conditions.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: To validate the multiscale model, a special experimental setup has been developed to measure the local polarization curves along the cell length.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: For this purpose, a specific design of the interconnect has been proposed in order to probe the local current density on standard cells.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: A good agreement has been found between the experimental and simulated data for different operating conditions.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: The fully validated model has been used to analyze the cell operation in electrolysis and fuel cell modes.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances

Sentencas: The activated reaction pathways associated with the elementary steps in the active layers have been investigated depending on the position along the cell length.
Titulo: A multiscale model validated on local current measurements for understanding the solid oxide cells performances
